author: Sayeth Di Puppeth

text: This was fun song to write. It is also the only song in Trine soundtracks that is canonical (canon is a contrapuntal compositional technique that employs a melody with one or more imitations of the melody played after a given duration).  Fangle Forest is filled with weird, small but cute creatures. And even though the undead Scourge have now filled the forest, it has still maintained the innocence and purity. (Trine Legendary OST Bundle is now available at aritunes.com for all interested!)

author: goodbye

text: Man, I had no idea this game was made by company of my country. O_o They really need to advertise a bit more. I usually hear of games that make a big hit abroad (such as Max Payne and the like) but nothing like this. I feel a bit ashamed for not having kept track of development lately. On a brighter note, it looks like I've found a favourite among the rare breed of Finnish fantasy music composers.  ^^
